turns.content: Are there any famous museums or art galleries in Novosibirsk that I should check out?

Yes, there are several museums and art galleries in Novosibirsk that are worth visiting:

1. The State Art Museum of Novosibirsk - it has a collection of over 12,000 artworks, including paintings, graphic art, sculptures, and applied art.

2. The Novosibirsk State Museum of Local Lore - it has exhibits on the history and culture of Siberia, including displays on indigenous peoples, flora and fauna, and geology.

3. The Museum of the History of Science and Technology of Siberia - it displays the history of scientific and technological achievements in Siberia, including exhibits on space exploration, nuclear energy, and transportation.

4. The Novosibirsk State Museum of Fine Arts - it has a collection of Russian and European art, including works by renowned artists such as Ilya Repin and Marc Chagall.

5. The Contemporary Art Center of Novosibirsk - it showcases exhibitions of contemporary art from both local and international artists.

6. The Novosibirsk Regional Museum of Ethnography and Folk Art - it exhibits the culture and traditions of different ethnic groups in Siberia.

All of these museums and galleries are located in central Novosibirsk and can be easily accessed by public transport.
